typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col1 as short,
		col2 as short,
		col3 as boolean,
		col4 as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['translated/csv/site/USR/FDC/Tools/ASH10653/2020-008-01/*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		col1,
		col2,
		col3,
		col4
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
